experience_history.name: Innovuze Solutions Inc.
experience_history.job_description: In charge of maintaining the core schematic editing feature of engineering oriented websites. In charge of analytics data presentation in the frontend of some websites. Pioneered unit testing and component based programming in the frontend.

experience_history.job_description: Worked as a contractor for a client in New Zealand for creating various websites. Websites include price scrapers, fuel vouchers, hardware stores, gyms and genomic data warehousing.
